summary: Ötzi, also known as the Iceman, is an ancient mummy of a man who lived over 5,000 years ago in the Copper Age. His frozen body was found in the Alps near the Austria-Italy border. Ötzi is special because he is the oldest natural human mummy found in Europe, giving us a rare look at life back then. Researchers think he was killed by an arrow. Today, we can see his remains and personal items at a museum in Italy, learning about his life and the mysteries surrounding his death.
title: Ötzi
